message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm asking for $90 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I value the product at more than $70, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $75? That's a good compromise, don't you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $72?
